author: hwright
msg: Add a pool parameter to svn_opt_resolve_revisions(), and make it return
an svn_error_t *.  We currently don't need to use these facilities, but
future functionality might, and it would prevent us from needing to rev
the api.  Followup to r23434
Suggested by: dlr
ivan
* subversion/include/svn_opt.h,
subversion/libsvn_subr/opt.c:
(svn_opt_resolve_revisions): Add pool parameter and return an svn_error_t *.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c,
subversion/libsvn_client/ra.c:
Adjust callers of svn_opt_resolve_revisions() to match the api change.

author: nikclayton
msg: Refactor the revprop_get() tests.
[in subversion/bindings/swig/perl/native/t/client]
* 3client.t, revprop_get.t: Refactor the tests for revprop_get(), remove
them from 3client.t and put them in the new file revprop_get.t.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix a bug where reverting a path replaced with history leaves copyfrom info
behind.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(revert_admin_things): In addition to clearing the copied flag, also
clear the copyfrom-url and copyfrom-rev fields.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/revert_tests.py
(revert_file_merge_replace_with_history): Check that the copy from info is
no longer present after reverting the replaced file.
